meka gedara kiyala hithuwada?"kiyapu saddeta mama uda giya.passene sin eka danne.mata ninda gihin usawiya athule.polis karayek thamayi ka gahala thiyenne.mama wadiwela hitapu thana eha paththe podi idak thibba.ara poliskaraya ariyas ekatama kalu thadiyek genalla ethana induwa.dan ithin mona nidaganilida?harennawath ida na.poliskaraya nondiyata wage "hik hik" gala ethanin giya.kolloth ithin mata wande danawa.mama ithin mata neme wage hitiya.ape naduwa kathakala.nikan usawiyama his una wage.eka paratama 18k kuduwata nagiddi kohomada ithin.wadiya naduwa ahuwe na eekath masekata kal damma.kisi ganak nathuwa nadu kal danawa.
